LIGHTNING

Unlocking the Web: A Journey into Accessibility

10:00 AM

About

Join me for an exciting journey into the world of web accessibility! üåê‚ú® Discover how I got into #a11y and why it's essential for for everyone to consider. Learn about common web accessibility mistakes and see practical, easy-to-implement solutions that can transform your web projects into more inclusive and user-friendly experiences. Don't miss this opportunity to elevate your skills and make a meaningful impact. Together, let's create a more accessible web for everyone!

Speakers

Delphine MILLET

I've been enjoying my role as a front-end developer at Back Market for 4 years now!

My goal is to build solutions that meet users' needs, and I strive not to leave anyone out. That's why accessibility is one of my key interests.

If I'm not on my laptop, you'll probably find me with my dog, knitting, sewing, or gardening.
